item.title: Help! i cant use ANY client i downloaded!

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

You downloaded jdk 6 update 27 development kit? and went into your client folder and change the jdk version in the compiler?

item.title: Help! i cant use ANY client i downloaded!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

when it says that it means it does not recognize java anywhere on your computer so download this JDK 6 Update 27 Development Kit with NetBeans 7.0.1 from here:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-netbeans-jsp-142931.html if it ask to install netbeans click no or cancel on it. Then go to your client folder go to compiler and right click on it to edit it and if it has something like this in it"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" *.java change it to “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe” *.java save it then try to compile. If that doesn’t work ill give you a code in my compiler and you can try that.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! i cant use ANY client i downloaded!
